data.eml:eml: Begonia jaguarensis L. Kollmann, R. S. Lopes & Peixoto (Begoniaceae), a new species from North of Espírito Santo State, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ludovic Jean Charles Kollmann, Robson da Silva Lopes, Ariane Luna Peixoto (2015): Begonia jaguarensis L. Kollmann, R. S. Lopes & Peixoto (Begoniaceae), a new species from North of Espírito Santo State, Brazil. Candollea 70: 43-48, DOI: 10.15553/c2015v701a4
